name: Paint Paul
description:
Paint Paul is a simple & very challenging and addictive game.

The longer you survive, the more you score. So, get ready for most addictive game ever.

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~

- iOS 10 or later support
- Awesome Gameplay music
- Better sound effects
- 10 Levels
- Game Center Intergration
- Enjoy beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music
- Adorable , fun, and thoughtful design

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - jared@nxtlvl.miami
